.
While we hope that all who join our guild will enjoy there time with us and remain with us for the duration of their EQ life, we understand that there are times when we all feel like there is something different that we want, and perhaps the grass would be a little greener in another guild.

If you make the choice to disband from the guild, we will wish you well and the blessing of your diety of choice. That said, guild membership should not be taken lightly, and the guild frowns on disbanding to make some petty point or for purposes of "guild hopping." As such...
Disbanding from The Exodus Fellowship:
If you wish to contact the High Council through E-mail,
please click here!
Another note about disbanding:

In order to keep the guild healthy and happy, we always need feedback. Before disbanding, you are strongly urged to contact an officer and indicate that you are leaving the guild and briefly why you have made this choice. It is considered rude by most guilds (and we are no exception to this particular rule) to just disappear - that is, disband without word, warning, or comment. Again, we wish you well in your future travels, but please allow us to understand your choice so that we may, if appropriate, take that input into the future of the guild.
If a member disbands from the Exodus Fellowship they will not be allowed back into the guild. The High Council can make exceptions if they so desire, but are not obligated to take anyone back in the situation of self disbandment, so be careful with your decision. We do not take our membership lightly and neither should you.
If you did not personally disband yourself, feel free to contact an officer explaining your situation and the High Council will decide whether or not you will be allowed to rejoin.
The High Council reserves the right to disband , remove forum privileges, and delete any posts including re-applications for disruptive behavior.
